forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. North wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of this early morning, Downtown San Francisco finds itself cradled in the embrace of a clear night, a gentle hush reminiscent of a calm sea. The temperature hovers comfortably around fifty, with a whisper of a north northeast wind adding a refreshing note to the air. As dawn approaches, the promise of a partly sunny day emerges, with a high expected near seventy-one, gracefully tapering off to a cooler sixty-six as afternoon stretches forward.

The cityscape, silhouetted against the horizon, reveals hints of clarity that foretell a lovely day ahead. While some coastal fog may linger beyond the Golden Gate, it appears determined to grant the city a serene canvas for most of the day. There’s an inviting warmth in this outlook, beckoning one to don light layers, perhaps a comfortable sweater to ward off the residual chill. As day unfolds, consider strolling along the waterfront, taking in the pastel reflections on the bay, or perhaps indulging in the city’s myriad cafés, where the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the laughter of neighbors. It’s a day that offers an array of simple pleasures; a perfect stage for reveling in the delights of everyday life under San Francisco's radiant sky.
